external_games.name: Hollywood Hills Mansion (With VR Home Theater)
Hollywood Hills Mansion (With VR Home Theater)

name: Hollywood Hills Mansion (With VR Home Theater)
summary: The Hollywood Hills Mansion is the perfect space to unwind and escape. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Los Angeles skyline and watch content from Facade TV (or your own side-loaded content) on our Entertainment On Demand system. Can be experienced with or without a VR headset!
